name: open-in-gitkraken
description: 🐙+🦑=⚡️ Open in GitKraken is a simple browser extension for opening GitHub links in GitKraken. ⨉ GitKraken Tools is an unofficial collection of tools for GitKraken built and maintained by GitKraken ambassadors & enthusiasts.

scripts.test: echo "\033[1;33mNo tests are available for this package\033[00m" && exit 0

author: GitKraken Tools (unofficial)
